title: LF Sup & Mid - Bronze/Silver elo Team
body:
Hey, 
3 of us have just started up a team and need Support and Mid roles to be filled.

We're happy to have a game with anyone and see how it all goes.
Just send me an add on LOL, and ask to play with us.

replies.body: still need a supp? add me He Is We silver 3

Hey ive been climbing and im b1 almost at silver and i'd be glad to play on the team. Playing champs like, yas,lb,syndra,lulu,orianana,etc.  in the mid lane. Just throwing out a wide variety of champs i play out there. I have half decent cs rate, better than most bronze players.I use skype alot for games and i can be available with curse chat as well.  If you choose to hook me up, my username is: Fire Bladze
